subject: Who made the Jerome and Thoth fonts?
msgSnippet: Somehow I’ve got a copy of the Jerome font. It has Quikscript letters in the ISO-8859-1/Windows-1252 block, not in the Private Use Area. I have some plans to
messageBody:
Somehow I’ve got a copy of the Jerome font. It has Quikscript letters in the ISO-8859-1/Windows-1252 block, not in the Private Use Area. I have some plans to display it on my site, but I’m disinclined to do anything more than the bare minimum if I can’t get clear licensing from it. Does anyone know who made it and if this person is available to re-release it under a clear open-source license like the Apache License, version 2.0?

Same question for Thoth.

Thanks in advance,
Nathan
